page.title: 09SHOPS IN HOOK
page.content: Many people travel to shops outside Hook for major purchases but there is a range of shops selling convenience goods. These include:- food shops- Londis; Black's 'fruit & veg'; Cordon Bleu freezer shop; Lloyd Hill Butchers; Roberts wine merchants and a bakers: Take-away food shops include Big Fry and Poh Wah: Other shops include two estate agents-Carsons and Poulters; a sub post office with gifts and stationary; Stockwells Hardware; Gaye Fashions; a video shop; Bowmans Chemist; Hairdresser and two antique shops. Nearly all these shops are on Station Road or London Road.New shops are planned for 0.2 hectares on the present Lorry Park Site and a further 0.8 hectares at the corner of Elms Road and London Road. These new shops are to include a large supermarket.
